name: A Bird's gotta eat!
description:
Made for the Mini Jam 99.

The theme was BIRDS, and the limitation was "Can't Stop Moving!"

You are a little bird that's just learning to fly! And your bird parents aren't there to feed you! It's time you take matters in your own wings!

The objective of the game is for the little bird to eat 5 stacks of food before the other birds arrive and eat everything! Find the 5 piles of seed scattered around the city before the time runs out!

You play with WASD/Space keys.

Press the "Esc" key to quit the game.

Unfortunately I had to rush the original version because I couldn't work on it on the last day of the Jam (I miss the entire day due to a maintenance in the electrical infrastructure of my  neighborhood and I was notified of it after the Jam started).

I'll update the game with polish and a proper UI soon.
